2112.subject: SBS
2112.course_title_long: Rsrch Mthd for SBS: Qual Emph
2112.descrlong: This course presents various research methods, primarily qualitative and some quantitative methods.  It explores the main theories and methodologies.  It allows students to explore different paradigms for research design, data collection, and data analyses in the social sciences.  Students learn how to make professional presentations of findings.  (Offered spring semester.)
